name: Acute Hearing
description: Due to your exemplary hearing you gain a blind sight of 20 metres and have +2 to Perception skill checks that require hearing.

name: Advanced First Aid
description: Whenever you heal a creature using the First Aid trait you will heal them for an additional 1D6.

name: Ambidextrous
description: You no longer receive the -2 penalty to attack rolls for making attacks with a weapon in your off-hand.

name: Battlemage
description: You only require one hand free to cast a spell. Two-handed weapons are only considered to take up one hand for the purpose of spell casting.
prerequisites: 1D6 in any Fighting Skill and and Arcane or Religious Domain

name: Berserker
description: While not wearing any armour as a free action you may enter what is referred to as a berserk state, until the start of your next turn. While in this state you may reroll rolls of a 1 for melee attack rolls and damage rolls with melee weapons. Additionally, the damage reduction dice afforded to you by the unarmoured defence trait is increased to 1D6+2 while you are in a berserk state. At the start of your next turn you may opt to continue your berserk state with no action required but you must pay the Exertion cost again.

name: Berserkerâ€™s Fury
description: While you are in a berserk state you gain +2 to damage with all melee attacks.

name: Brave
description: When you make a save against being frightened you may gain +4 to the roll. Additionally, if you pass a save against becoming frightened, all allies who witnessed your bravery gain +2 to the next save against being frightened they make this combat.

name: Brawny
description: You count as one size category larger than you are for the purposes of making the grab action. Additionally, when you fail an athletics skill check you may expend 1 exertion and add 4 to the roll.

name: Bulwark
description: Your bonus to Evasion from shields and bucklers now covers attacks from your side hexes. Additionally, when you are wielding a shield the durability of any armour you are wearing is increased by 2.

name: Close Quarters Marksman
description: Allows a Firearm to be used while engaged at a -2 penalty instead of the usual -4. If the Firearm has the pistol keyword it can be used at no penalty

name: Combat Manoeuvre
description: As a minor action, you may allow an ally within 30 metres to immediately move as a reaction.

name: Combat Swap
description: As a reaction, you may allow two of your allies (including yourself) that are adjacent to each other within 30 metres of you to swap positions with each other. They can also use this move to adjust their facings freely. This swap does not incur attacks of opportunity.

name: Covering Fire
description: When you hit a creature with a ranged attack using a bow, a crossbow or Firearm you may give you allies +2 to attack rolls made against that creature until the start of your next turn.

name: Critical Strikes
description: Aimed shots made as a result of an explosion when making an attack roll with an unarmed attack cost no Exertion. Additionally your unarmed attacks deal +2 damage, this damage is in addition to the iron fist trait.

name: Crossbow Expert
description: When making ranged attacks with a crossbow while an enemy occupies one of your front hexes you ignore the -4 penalty to your attack rolls.

name: Crowding Blows
description: Whenever you make more than one unarmed melee attack at any single creature in your turn, they have -2 to attack rolls on their next turn.

name: Deft Footwork
description: You may use your minor action to shift.

name: Devout
description: Your character is now a devout and thus is able to wield magic in the form of casting spells. All rules relevant to this can be found in the Magic section of this book. When you take this trait you may immediately choose 4 spells to learn that you have the prerequisites for.

name: Deulist
description: Any damage rolls you make as a result of a melee attack with Swift, Bladed or Blunt weapons without the two-handed or dagger keywords may generate two explosions rather than one.

name: Deulist Intermediate
description: When making damage rolls as a result of a melee attack with Swift, Bladed or Blunt weapons without the two-handed or dagger keywords explosions occur on the two highest values that can be rolled on your damage dice

name: Deulist Mastery
description: When making damage rolls as a result of a melee attack with Swift, Bladed or Blunt weapons without the two-handed or dagger keywords you may choose to re-roll as many of your damage dice as you wish with for 2 Exertions per dice you re-roll. You can only opt to use this trait once per damage roll.

name: Elusive
description: If you have used your action to disengage, you may use your minor action to attack one of the creatures that you disengaged from.

name: Evasive
description: Whenever a creature makes a melee attack roll against you, you may use your reaction to give yourself +1 evasion against that attack.

name: Fleetfoot
description: Your movement speed is increased by 2 metres.

name: Firearms Master
description: When you fail a reload check with a weapon with the Loading or Fast Loading keyword you may choose to spend 2 exertions to automatically pass instead.

name: First Aid
description: You may now attempt to heal people using your medical knowledge. After spending 15 uninterrupted minutes tending to someone you may allow them to recover 1D6 health, or 2D6 health if you have a medical kit. You can perform this heal on any conventionally living creature though they must complete a  full rest before they can be healed again.

name: Expert Engineer
description: Allows for the creation of more complex mechanical contraptions.

name: Giant Slayer
description: reatures treat you as if you are one size category larger than you are. Additionally, you gain +2 to damage rolls made against creatures of a larger size category than yours, that are at least of size category large themselves.

name: Go for the Eyes
description: When making an aimed shot with a weapon with the dagger keyword you may choose to aim for the eyes rather than at a more conventional target, causing the target to become blinded for the subsequent 3 turns. At the end of each of the target's turns they may make Strength Endurance save with a threshold of the average of your Agility attribute dice and Swift Weapons dice.

name: Grappler
description: Unarmed attacks made against a creature you have grappled deal an extra +1 damage. Additionally, as an attack you may throw a creature you have grabbed provided you are strong enough to reasonably lift them. If you choose to do so, target a hex within 6 metres of you that you can see to throw them into. The target is hurled through the air into that hex and lands prone.

name: Iron Fist
description: Your unarmed attacks now deal 2D6 bludgeoning damage and your unarmed attacks count as dealing 2 additional damage for the purposes of determining whether a character has been knocked down by damage.

name: Leg Sweep
description: When you hit a creature with an unarmed attack you may make a contested Acrobatics, Athletics or boxing skill check with the target creature against their Acrobatics or Athletics, on a success the target is knocked prone.

name: Mighty Blow
description: When you hit a melee attack with a two-handed weapon, you may add your Strength attribute dice to your damage roll.

name: Mounted Combatant
description: Mobility is key in combat and you take full advantage of this by fighting mounted on the back of a beast. You do not suffer the negative effects from mounted combat.

name: Multi-Shot
description: Whenever you make a ranged attack with a bow as part of an attack action you may immediately make a second ranged attack with that same bow as a minor action.

name: Opportunist
description: Whenever you would make a reaction you may instead opt not to expend any reaction and instead expend exertion.

name: Ordered Assault
description: As a minor action you may allow one of your allies within 30 metres of you to immediately make a single attack.

name: Piercing Shot
description: When you hit an attack using a swift weapon, bow or crossbow, you may opt to halve (rounded up) your opponents defence value against the attack.
prerequisites: 1D8 Swift weapons, Crossbows, Firearms or Bows

name: Pistol Expert
description: You may simultaneously reload two Firearms with a single reloading check if both Firearms have the Pistol Keyword.

name: Polearm Master
description: Whenever you hit a creature with a melee attack using a polearm you may make the attack count as a charge regardless of whether you charged or not.

name: Precision Strike
description: Whenever you make an attack roll against a creature you may impose a -2 to the roll, if you hit then the attack is an aimed shot. If you explode on the hit when using this ability, it costs 0 Exertion.

name: Rallying Cry
description: As a minor action, you may allow one of your allies within 30 metres of you who is currently under the effects of a spell to immediately repeat their save in an attempt to end the effect.

name: Reckless Attack
description: When you make a melee attack with a weapon without the dagger keyword you may impose a -2 to the roll, although if you hit the attack you may add your Strength attribute dice to your damage roll.

name: Redirect
description: When a creature misses a melee attack against you, you may use your reaction to force your attacker to immediately make the same melee attack against another creature adjacent to them.

name: Riposte
description: If a creature in your front hexes misses a melee attack against you, you may make an attack of opportunity against them.

name: Sabotage
description: When a creature adjacent to you makes a save, you may use your reaction to give them -2 to the roll.

name: Sentinel
description: When making an attack of opportunity, if you hit you may spend 1 Exertion to reduce the movement speed of the target to 0m until the start of their next turn.

name: Selfless Defender
description: When a creature adjacent to you is attacked, you may use your reaction to become the target of this attack yourself, any damage taken as a result of this attack is reduced by 1D6 after defence calculation.

name: Sneak Attack
description: When you hit a creature with a ranged attack or with a swift weapon while you are in stealth you may opt to add 6D4 to the damage roll.
prerequisites: Swift Weapons 1D8 or Bows 1D8 or Crossbows 1D8 or Firearms 1D8

name: Squad Sight
description: When you make a ranged attack you may target creatures in the eyeline of an ally within 20 metres of you as well as on your own.

name: Strong Arm
description: The range at which you can throw a thrown weapon and the range that you can throw a target with the Grappler trait is increased by half the maximum value that can be rolled on your Strength attribute dice in metres.

name: Superior Reflexes
description: If you have at least one hand free and are hit with a bow, crossbow, firearm or thrown weapon, you may use your reaction to make a Boxing skill check, if the result of this roll is equal to or greater that the result of the ranged attack roll made against you then you catch the projectile and the attack is negated. You may choose to immediately drop the projectile, keep a hold of it or throw it back at the attacker with a throwing check dealing your Strength attribute dice in damage of the same damage type as the weapon, provided they are within 30m of you.

name: Sweeping Blow
description: When you make a melee attack with a melee weapon, you may opt to target all creatures in your front hexes with that attack.

name: Tactical Retreat
description: As a minor action, you may allow one of your allies within 30 metres of you to immediately take the disengage action and move as their reaction.

name: Tactician
description: When rolling initiative, you and your allies may have +2 to their initiative roll. Additionally, after you roll initiative, you may opt to swap the initiatives of up to 4 willing creatures.

name: Thousand Cuts
description: When making an attack as an action with a weapon with the dagger keyword, you may make an additional attack as part of that same action.

name: Trick Shot
description: When making a ranged attack, you may ignore up to five creatures or pieces of cover directly between you and your target for the purposes of them being in the way.

name: Unarmoured Defences
description: While you are not wearing any armour your evasion is increased by 1 and you reduce any instance of damage by 1D4+2 although this dice cannot explode. The only exception to this is that this damage reduction cannot reduce damage taken from overspending exertion.

name: Unrelenting Charge
description: If you move 6 or more metres in a straight line towards an enemy you may make a contested Athletics skill check against their Athletic or Acrobatics. If you succeed, you may choose to knock them prone or push them back 4 metres.

name: Unstoppable Berserker
description: While you are in a berserk state you cannot be rendered charmed, frightened, unconscious or incapacitated.

name: Vigilant
description: When making an Agility save to avoid taking damage, you take half damage on a failed save and a quarter of the damage on a successful save.

name: Wicked Knife
description: Whenever you make an attack roll against a creature with a weapon that has the dagger key word you may impose a -2 to the roll, if you hit then the attack is an aimed shot. Additionally, when making an Aimed shot with a weapon with the dagger key word along with the regular aimed shots you may choose one of the following: Slice Artery, Cut Tendon, or Puncture Lung.

name: Witch Hunter
description: You gain +2 to saves against spells. Additionally, when you damage a creature that is concentrating on a spell they have -2 to the save required to maintain concentration on that spell.

name: Wizard
description: Your character is now a wizard and thus is able to wield magic in the form of casting spells. All rules relevant to this can be found in the Magic section of this book. When you take this trait you may immediately choose 4 spells to learn that you have the prerequisites for.
